Modern Script Simple Sympathy Thank You Card

Hot Deals! Modern Script Simple Sympathy Thank You Card – Sympathy Cards Popular Modern Script Simple Sympathy Thank You Card if you are looking for it, we recommend it Modern Script Simple Sympathy Thank You Card It’s in stock and ready to ship.These elegant, simple sympathy acknowledgement note cards express your gratitude on 4-5 lines of custom text as well as a personalized sign-off as well as the name and date of the passed family member. The timeless modern script calligraphy design in black and white make this a beautiful yet easy way to thank family and friends during this sad time. Price:$1.65
